Listening List

Some of what I listen to makes it here. If you like the general flavours of the below list, you can find more on my bandcamp fan page. Just as in open source, if you find that an artist provides value to you, consider supporting their work by buying their music from Bandcamp. The artist gets the lion's share.

sdf: sdf Tosca: Suzuki

Minimal Kids: No Age Robert Rich & Luca Formentini: Cloud Ornament

DZihan & Kamien: IV Norman Westberg: Jasper Sits Out

Lusine icl: Iron City Loscil // Lawrence English: Colours of Air

Yeghishe Manukyan: Haykakan Duduk Elin Piel: Ingrid Linnea

Biosphere: Dropsonde Aleksi Perälä: GAIA 5

Sine: Feel Love Jako Jako: Inverted Audio - Mix

musicforprogramming.net: (various mixes) Telepopmusik: Angel milk - Don't Look Back

NTS: Red Laser Records: Station, (...) Soma FM: Groove Salad

Robert Rich: Vestiges Murcof: Cosmos

Janek Schaefer: Glitter in my Tears nimu: Picture in Picture

Steve Reich: Music for 18 Musicians Jon Kennedy: Corporeal

Groove Armada: Goodbye Country Skee Mask: Compro
